content: Water-Wood Beast is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This hidden beast lurks beneath the water and will try to catch you by surprise as much as it can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water-Wood_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Water-Wood Beast'.
The content is as follows:
Water-Wood Beast is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This hidden beast lurks beneath the water and will try to catch you by surprise as much as it can.
